{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Extreme Networks |model=AP-7622 |revision=-68B30-EU/US (2.0) |upc=644728011506 |ean=0644728011506 |asin=B072BJ744Y;GB;,B071RR7R1X;US; |newegg=9SIA24G5SY4125 |fcc_date=09/06/2017 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |availability=new |type=access point |fcc_id=QXO-7622, UZ7AP7622 |ic_id=4141B-7622 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=0.85 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_poe=af |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM47452;BCM47452B0KRFBG; |cpu1_cspeed=900 |fla1=512 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S34ML04G200TFI00 |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MT41K64M16TW-107:J <!--6DJI7 D9SFT--> |ram1_num=2 |jtag=yes,, 20-pin header,, |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, RJ-45 |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM47452;BCM47452B0KRFBG; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM47452;BCM47452B0KRFBG; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=1 |wi2_rxchains=1 |wi2_sstreams=1 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Broadcom |eth_chip2_model=BCM54210E;BCM54210EB1KMLG; |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=Single-Chip Bluetooth 4.1 LE Transceiver/Baseband Processor;Broadcom (Cypress);BCM20704;20704UA1, KFFB1G, UN1605 P11, 569880 P3;1; |flags=Bluetooth 4.1 LE, DFS (master), DFS (slave), |stock_boot=CFE |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac }} {{TagLine|Enterprise-Grade Wireless Indoor Access Points}} :[http://www.extremenetworks.com/product/wing-ap-7622/ Product page]
802.11ac Dual Band Radio 1x1 or Single Band Radio 2x2 *2.4GHz + 5GHz concurrent single stream (1x1 2.4G + 1x1 5G) *2.4GHz or 5GHz dual stream (2x2 2.4G or 2x2 5G) :internal antenna, BT 4.1 (BLE), 1x GbE ports, Serial (RJ-45)
"ZEBRA_ASPEN-C_BCM47452" and "Rev 2.0" is silkscreened on the board.
*FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/QXO-7622 QXO-7622] (2017-09-06) *FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/UZ7AP7622 UZ7AP7622] (2016-11-18)
[[:Category:Motorola Solutions|Motorola Solutions]] -> Zebra Technologies (2014) -> [[:Category:Extreme Networks|Extreme Networks]] (2016)
